metadata.title: CVE-2021-46244 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: A Divide By Zero vulnerability exists in HDF5 v1.13.1-1 vis the function H5T__complete_copy () at /hdf5/src/H5T.c. This vulnerability causes an aritmetic exception, leading to a Denial of Service (DoS).

criterions.comment: hdf5 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
insighttoolkit4 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
kissplice package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
paraview package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
vtk6 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
xdmf package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
